aboutMe: Hey, my name is Ashwin. I am currently a Senior at Mountain View High School in California. I started coding in my sophomore year of high school, where I learned languages like Java, C, & Python. From there I branched out on my own & learned web based languages such as HTML, CSS, & Javascript, as well as frameworks such as React.
aboutMore: My hobbies include swimming & athletics in general, hanging out with my family and friends, & reading Calvin and Hobbes.

activities.message: I am a Captain of the MVHS varsity swim team, and have been a part of the school Varsity Swim Team for every year of High School. I also swim year-round for LAMVAC, a local competitive swim club
My swim career has caused me to pursue being a lifeguard and am also CPR & First-Aid certified
I participate in many clubs throughout my school including Spartan Buddies, which I have been apart of for the past 4 years, as well as the CS Club and others

rightNow.message: My class-load this semester includes: Advanced CS, Photography I, Philosophy in Literature, AP Physics C Electricity and Magnetism, AP Statistics, & AP Macroeconomics.

rightNow.title: School Wide Projects
rightNow.message: I am working with MVHS Ambassadors and launched Spartan Assistant, an app that will help incoming freshmen orient themselves around campus. I am currently leading a team of 4 that is working on a project that will better my school known as MV Xperience.

rightNow.title: Advanced Web Development Teacher
rightNow.message: I am currently teaching Advanced Web Development to students in within the MVHS CS Club. As of right now this course will cover aspects of React.js and other tools that will help students learn to build bigger and better full stack applications.

rightNow.title: MVHacks 5.0
rightNow.message: MVHacks 5.0 is a beginner orientated hackathon, and have taken the postion of Event Director. I am in charge of leading a team of 5 in order to plan out the logistics & execution of the event.

rightNow.title: Personal Projects
rightNow.message: As of right now I am working on projects that will help improve my progamming skills. I want to get more practice with C++/C#, TypeScript, Gatsby, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, as well as learn Next.js
